text: Melanie Chartoff (born December 15, 1948) is an American actress. She played Lillah Warfield in Wiseguy on CBS. Also on CBS, she played Dr. Mary on Newhart Chartoff was born in New Haven, Connecticut on December 15, 1948. == Animated television == Year Title Role Notes 1978-1980 Challenge of the Super Friends additional voices (voice) series regular; 16 episodes 1991-2004 Rugrats Didi Pickles/Minka Kropotkin (voice) series regular; 155 episodes 1996-1999 Jumanji The Animated Series Aunt Nora Shepherd (voice role) series regular; 22 episodes 2000-2004 The Powerpuff Girls Additional voices 45 episodes 2000 Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child Grape Fox (voice) Episode: "Aesop's Fables: A Whodunit Musical" 2002 The Zeta Project Lead Scientist Episode: "Cabin Pressure" 2003-2008 All Grown Up!
